title: Working through the hour of maximum danger
description: Toward the end of his inaugural address, President Kennedy observed that, “In the long history of the world, only a few generations have been granted the role of defending freedom in its hour of maximum danger.” He proved right that his own time, culminating in the Cuban Missile Crisis, was such an hour. Ours, I...
